UPDATE wp_cptn_po_queue cpq LEFT JOIN wp_cptn_po_slave cps ON cps.id = cpq.slave SET cpq.slave = NULL WHERE (cps.created <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 minute) OR cps.created IS NULL) AND cpq.executed IS NULL AND cpq.slave IS NOT NULL
